tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE viewer_engagement_and_feedback (
    event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_date DATE,
    event_name VARCHAR(50),
    viewer_id UUID,
    viewer_name VARCHAR(50),
    viewer_location VARCHAR(100),
    engagement_rating INT,
    feedback_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE viewer_engagement (
    viewer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_type VARCHAR,
    interaction_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE viewer_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    viewer_id INT,
    event_id INT,
    feedback_rating INT,
    feedback_comment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE viewer_feedback (
  feedback_id INT,
  viewer_id INT,
  event_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE viewers (
    viewer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    viewer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    event_id INT NOT NULL,
    engagement_level INT,
    feedback_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    viewer_id INT NOT NULL,
    event_id INT NOT NULL,
    feedback_score INT,
    feedback_comment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE viewers_events (
    viewer_id INT,
    event_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (viewer_id, event_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (viewer_id) REFERENCES viewers(viewer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES events(event_id)
);
